page.title: 07MELSONBY-The Youth Club
page.content: The{Youth Club}was{reorganised}at the beginning of {1984}after an{absence of {more than 12 years.} A grant from the {Wm.Cockin Trust }helped to buy some {sports equipment}initially and since then events have been held to help funds. The{ club was reformed} in {response to requests} from{teenagers who{ complained }at the total{ lack of {facilities for their age group} within the village. This is an{area of social {concern} which merits far more attention than it receives now or has received in the past. There are obvious limits such as cash and 'bricks & mortar' facilities which a small rural population can afford for such a worthwhile project as this. Local Govenment does little to assist and Central Government of all political persuasions gives nothing but platitudinous verbal comment!
